channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elise Stefanik, close ally of Trump, announces run for governor of New York
item.description: The upstate New Yorker was previously tapped to become the president's ambassador to the United Nations, although that was pulled.

item.title: Rockefeller Center’s Christmas Tree cut down in upstate New York, standing a towering 75 feet tall
item.description: The 11-ton tree was loaded onto a 100-foot-long trailer as scores of people turned out for the occasion.

item.title: Asian universities turn into tourist destinations as Chinese students look closer to home for higher education
item.description: Tourists have long flocked to Western universities, like Oxford or Harvard—but visitors are now adding Asian campuses to their itineraries.

item.title: Hertz sees 20% spike in one-way rentals amid air traffic chaos
item.description: America seems to be hitting the road as its air fleet is increasingly grounded.

item.title: Peloton recalls nearly 878,000 exercise bikes after several seat posts break
item.description: Both consumer safety watchdogs and Peloton urge owners of these bikes to stop using them and contact the New York-based exercise company for a free se...

item.title: Grammys 2026 Snubs and Surprises: ‘KPop Demon Hunters,’ Justin Bieber and More
item.description: A look at the nominations’ unexpected story lines, including best new artist nominees with unusual paths and the event’s hesitancy around “KPop Demon ...

item.title: As Idaho Grows Ever Redder, Boise Worries About Its Isolation
item.description: Two city councilors won re-election on Tuesday, though their support for a pride flag at City Hall had sparked challenges from the right. Still, Idaho...

item.title: New York Prepares for a Potential Trump Immigration Crackdown
item.description: The election of Zohran Mamdani as mayor has stoked speculation that President Trump might move to send forces into the city.

item.title: James Watson, Co-Discoverer of the Structure of DNA, Is Dead at 97
item.description: His decoding the blueprint for life with Francis H.C. Crick made him one of the most important scientists of the 20th century. He wrote a celebrated m...

item.title: Cornell Reaches Deal with Trump Administration to Restore Research Funds
item.description: The Ivy League university had warned of layoffs after the Trump administration stripped it of funds this year. The cuts were among the deepest in high...

item.title: 4 Arrested Over Disruption of Israeli Orchestra’s Concert
item.description: Several audience members shouted or lit flares as the Israel Philharmonic Orchestra performed in Paris. After the concert, the ensemble received 10 mi...

item.title: Leaders at COP30 Climate Summit in Belém Focus on the Rising Toll of Warming
item.description: “All we have to do is look outside,” one delegate said. “The sea rises, the coral dies.”

item.title: Russian Jailed for Placing Tiny Antiwar Signs in a Market Says She Would Do it Again
item.description: Freed in a major prisoner swap, Aleksandra Skochilenko said “the values of freedom of speech, of peace, could be more important than spending even 10 ...

item.title: Protest Disrupts Israeli Philharmonic Orchestra Concert in Paris
item.description: Four people were arrested after a protest at an Israeli Philharmonic Orchestra Concert in Paris on Thursday. Audience members shouted and set off flar...

item.title: Serbian Lawmakers Approve Luxury Trump Hotel on Historic Bombing Site
item.description: Despite a fraud investigation into officials who endorsed the project, Parliament used an extraordinary provision in the Constitution to push the plan...
